page.title: 08MERCAT SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: The Mercat was built in two phases. The first phase was opened in 1973; the second opened in 1983. It should be completed by 1988. The Mercat staff consists of 22 people, including 8 security guards and cleaners, who work from 10 p.m. to 6 a.m. 30 units are ocupied, 24 are vacant. The Mercat is open from Monday to Saturday from 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. but on Thursday and Friday it is open later. The owners are Standard Life. The cafe is beside the carousel in phase two. There are three murals depicting the pool, the Links Market and Kirkcaldy in 1938. Many charity entertainments and exhibitions are held during the year. There is a large car park which can hold 210 cars. The Mercat enjoys an excellent position in the middle of the High St.
